law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Approved foreign trade zone" means an area designated as a foreign trade zone under Title 5, Subtitle 8 of the Economic Development Article.
"Taxable net earnings" means the net earnings of a financial institution computed under § 8-204 of this subtitle and modified under §§ 8-205 and 8-206 of this subtitle.
